finestFlights.title: Finest Flights
finestFlights.shortDescription: Responsive front-end solution for an airline ticket sales platform, ensuring a seamless booking experience on any device.
finestFlights.fullDescription: Developed and maintain a high-performance, responsive front-end for Finest Flights, a global airline ticket company. The solution, built with Next.js and TypeScript, provides a seamless user experience, driving ticket sales and customer satisfaction. Ongoing work includes developing new features to meet evolving market demands.

theInteriorEdge.title: The Interior Edge
theInteriorEdge.shortDescription: Elegant and responsive portfolio website to showcase high-end flooring solutions, driving leads from large builders.
theInteriorEdge.fullDescription: Created a visually stunning and fully responsive website for The Interior Edge, a leader in flooring solutions. The site effectively showcases their extensive portfolio to major construction companies, generating qualified leads. Built with React, the solution provides a clean, modern, and professional online presence that reflects the quality of their work.

coffeeShopTiaRosa.title: Coffee Shops Tia Rosa
coffeeShopTiaRosa.shortDescription: Engaging and responsive website to boost a local coffee shop's digital presence and attract more customers.
coffeeShopTiaRosa.fullDescription: Developed a charming and responsive website to help Coffee Shops Tia Rosa connect with its community online. The platform effectively showcases their menu, location, and unique story, creating an inviting digital experience that drives foot traffic and builds customer loyalty. Built with Next.js, the site is fast, accessible, and easy to manage.

personalPortfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
personalPortfolio.shortDescription: A responsive personal portfolio to showcase my skills and successfully attract freelance and full-time opportunities.
personalPortfolio.fullDescription: This is the very portfolio you are browsing. I developed it as a practical demonstration of my technical abilities and design sense. The fully responsive and interactive experience is built to attract clients and employers by showcasing my work effectively. The tech stack includes Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion for smooth animations, and next-intl for internationalization.

sertanejoMadeiras.title: Sertanejo Madeiras
sertanejoMadeiras.shortDescription: A clean, responsive, and easy-to-navigate product catalog for a lumber company, delivering on the client's vision for simplicity.
sertanejoMadeiras.fullDescription: Delivered a clean and effective online presence for Sertanejo Madeiras, focusing on a simple and direct user experience as requested by the client. The responsive website, built with React, functions as a digital catalog, making it easy for customers to find product information, which has led to an increase in sales inquiries.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Maxwell Paulo, a Software Developer passionate about building digital solutions that merge creativity with performance. With a degree in Advertising and nearly a decade of experience as a teacher, I developed a unique skill for communication and understanding people—competencies that are now the foundation for translating my clients' needs into intuitive and effective products. The same discipline that led me to jump out of planes as a skydiver is what I apply to overcome complex development challenges.
aboutSection.paragraph2: My transition into tech was driven by a continuous quest for growth. I deepened my knowledge in top-tier bootcamps like Ironhack and Cubos Academy and continue to specialize with a degree in Analysis and Systems Development. With hands-on experience in startups, international projects, and freelance work, I've worked with technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and Django. I'm always ready to apply this versatility and dedication to bring your next big idea to life. Shall we talk?

exp1.description: Developing and maintaining the frontend for a global travel platform using Next.js and TypeScript. Responsibilities include implementing new features, optimizing performance, and ensuring a clean, scalable architecture in a fast-paced, agile environment.

exp2.description: Contributed to a fintech startup by developing new features and optimizing existing code in a full-stack environment with React, Python, and Django. I was responsible for maintaining code quality and collaborating within an agile team to enhance the platform.

exp3.company: Public Defender's Office of the Federal District
exp3.description: Engaged in the full lifecycle of a legacy system refactoring project, moving it to a modern React-based stack. Participated in requirements gathering, specification, testing, and implementation, contributing to significant system improvements.

exp4.description: Provided technical support for the Ministry of Social Development, resolving remote demands efficiently. This role honed my time management, attention to detail, and client-facing communication skills.

exp5.description: Planned and delivered customized English lessons for students of all ages. This entrepreneurial experience strengthened my ability to understand client needs, adapt strategies, and communicate complex topics clearly.

exp6.description: Taught English to children and adolescents, developing structured lesson plans and fostering an engaging learning environment. This position was foundational in building my communication and planning skills.

exp7.description: Managed social media for a philanthropic organization, developing content and designing graphics. This role linked my advertising background with digital execution and creative strategy.

exp8.description: My first role as an educator, where I planned and delivered English classes to teenagers and adults. This experience was crucial for developing my public speaking abilities and attention to detail.
